coursera.Title: Diseño de Experiencia del Usuario (UX) de Google Professional Certificate
coursera.Short Intro: El comienzo de tu carrera en el diseño UX. Con este programa adquirirás habilidades que te prepararán para trabajar en menos de 6 meses. No se requiere título ni experiencia previa.
coursera.Skills: Experiencia del usuario (UX),Esquema,Diseño de la experiencia del usuario (UXD),Investigación en UX,Prototipo,Esquema de página,Pruebas de usabilidad,Maqueta,Figma,Adobe XD,Trabajos de diseño de UX,

coursera.Title: Getting Started with AI using IBM Watson
coursera.Short Intro: In this course you will learn how to quickly and easily get started with Artificial Intelligence using IBM Watson. You will understand how Watson works, become familiar with its use cases and real life client examples, and be introduced to several of Watson AI services from IBM that enable anyone to easily apply AI and build smart apps. You will also work with several Watson services to demonstrate AI in action.
coursera.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: Arabic, French, Portuguese (European), Italian, Vietnamese, Korean, German, Russian, English, Spanish
coursera.Skills: Deep Learning,Application Programming Interfaces (API),Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,watson,

coursera.Title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials
coursera.Short Intro: Welcome to AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials. If you’re new to the cloud, whether you’re in a technical or non-technical role such as finance, legal, sales, marketing, this course will provide you with an understanding of fundamental AWS Cloud concepts to help you gain confidence to contribute to your organization’s cloud initiatives. This course is also the starting point to prepare for your AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification whenever it’s convenient for you.
coursera.Skills: Cloud Computing Security,AWS cloud,cloud networking,Cloud Computing,Migration and Innovation,

coursera.Title: Google Data Analytics Capstone: Complete a Case Study
coursera.Short Intro: This course is the eighth course in the Google Data Analytics Certificate. You’ll have the opportunity to complete an optional case study, which will help prepare you for the data analytics job hunt. Case studies are commonly used by employers to assess analytical skills. For your case study, you’ll choose an analytics-based scenario. You’ll then ask questions, prepare, process, analyze, visualize and act on the data from the scenario. You’ll also learn other useful job hunt skills through videos with common interview questions and responses, helpful materials to build a portfolio online, and more. Current Google data analysts will continue to instruct and provide you with hands-on ways to accomplish common data analyst tasks with the best tools and resources.
coursera.Skills: Job portfolio,Data Cleansing,Data Analysis,Data Visualization (DataViz),case study,

coursera.Title: Preparing for AI-900: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals exam
coursera.Short Intro: Microsoft certifications give you a professional advantage by providing globally recognized and industry-endorsed evidence of mastering skills in digital and cloud businesses.​​ In this course, you will prepare to take the AI-900 Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals certification exam.
coursera.Skills: Natural Language Processing,Test Preparation,Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,Microsoft Azure,

coursera.Title: Preparing for the AZ-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Exam
coursera.Short Intro: Microsoft certifications give you a professional advantage by providing globally recognized and industry-endorsed evidence of mastering skills in digital and cloud businesses.​​ In this course, you will prepare for the AZ-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals exam.
coursera.Skills: Test Preparation,Microsoft Azure,

coursera.Title: Applying Data Analytics in Accounting
coursera.Short Intro: This course explores business analytic applications in accounting. First, it presents a survey of technology topics in accounting, including process mining, blockchain and applications in audit, tax, and assurance. Next, the course explores visualization and basic analytics in audit and control testing using R and Alteryx. Next, the course examines the uses of text analysis in accounting and conducts text analysis using R and RStudio. Finally, the course examines robot process automation in general using UiPath and its applications in accounting.
coursera.Skills: Natural Language Processing,robotic process automation,Analytics,Data Analysis,Accounting Analytics,
coursera.Instructors: Gies College of Business, University of Illinois

coursera.Title: Getting Started with AI using IBM Watson
coursera.Short Intro: In this course you will learn how to quickly and easily get started with Artificial Intelligence using IBM Watson. You will understand how Watson works, become familiar with its use cases and real life client examples, and be introduced to several of Watson AI services from IBM that enable anyone to easily apply AI and build smart apps. You will also work with several Watson services to demonstrate AI in action.
coursera.Subtitle Languages: Subtitles: Arabic, French, Portuguese (European), Italian, Vietnamese, Korean, German, Russian, English, Spanish
coursera.Skills: Deep Learning,Application Programming Interfaces (API),Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,watson,

coursera.Title: Modernizing Data Lakes and Data Warehouses with Google Cloud
coursera.Short Intro: The two key components of any data pipeline are data lakes and warehouses. This course highlights use-cases for each type of storage and dives into the available data lake and warehouse solutions on Google Cloud in technical detail. Also, this course describes the role of a data engineer, the benefits of a successful data pipeline to business operations, and examines why data engineering should be done in a cloud environment.

coursera.Title: Preparing for DP-900: Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals Exam
coursera.Short Intro: Microsoft certifications give you a professional advantage by providing globally recognized and industry-endorsed evidence of mastering skills in digital and cloud businesses.​​ In this course, you will prepare to take the DP-900 Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals certification exam.
coursera.Skills: Test Preparation,Microsoft Azure,

udacity.Title: Data Analysis and Visualization with Microsoft Power BI
udacity.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for data analysis and visualization professionals by gaining the Power BI skills that top companies want.
udacity.Courses: Data Analysis and Visualization with Microsoft Power BI
udacity.What you learn: You’ll master the in-demand skills necessary to become a successful data analyst like data pre-processing, visualization and analysis using Microsoft Power BI as the primary tool.

udacity.Title: Become a Cloud Developer using Microsoft Azure
udacity.Short Intro: Learn to build cloud-based applications on Microsoft Azure, the cloud services platform used by 95% of Fortune 500 companies.
udacity.Prequisites: Intermediate programming experience, familiarity with SQL databases and version control with Git.
udacity.What you learn: Microsoft Azure is one of the most popular cloud services platforms used by enterprises, making it a crucial tool for cloud computing professionals to add to their skillset. The Cloud Developer using Microsoft Azure Nanodegree program teaches students how to deploy, build, migrate, and monitor applications on Azure, thereby preparing learners for success on Microsoft’s AZ-204 Azure Developer Associate Expert certification.

udacity.Title: AI Engineer using Microsoft Azure
udacity.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for Azure AI engineers and learn to design, build, and implement machine learning models, using Microsoft Azure.
udacity.Prequisites: Python, Microsoft Azure, JSON and REST programming semantics.
udacity.What you learn: You’ll master the skills necessary to implement machine learning models, design and build an end-to-end AI solution with Azure Cognitive Services, and deploy, monitor, and manage continuous improvement of an Azure AI solution. By the end of the program, you’ll be an ideal candidate for Microsoft certification A1-102.

udacity.Title: Data Engineering with Microsoft Azure
udacity.Short Intro: Master the job-ready skills you need to succeed as a Microsoft Azure data engineer like designing data models and utilizing other in-demand components of the cloud computing service.
udacity.Prequisites: Experience with SQL, Python, Azure, and Github.
udacity.What you learn: Learners will acquire the skills needed to design data models, create data pipelines, and navigate large datasets on the Azure platform. Additionally, they will learn to build data warehouses, data lakes, and lakehouse architecture.

udacity.Title: Become an AWS Cloud Architect
udacity.Short Intro: Lead your organization's cloud computing strategy as an AWS Cloud Architect. Plan, design, and build secure, high availability cloud infrastructure.
udacity.Prequisites: Experience with Cloud Computing, Programming, and AWS.
udacity.What you learn: Play a critical role in an organization’s cloud computing strategy as an AWS Cloud Architect. Learn to plan, design, and implement secure cloud infrastructure in AWS at scale. Begin by designing and building high availability infrastructure, and then move on to building scalable, secure, and cost-optimized architecture. Finally, explore and execute best practices and strategies around securing access to cloud services and infrastructure.

udacity.Title: Cloud Architect using Microsoft Azure
udacity.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for Azure cloud architects and learn the skills to translate business requirements into technical specifications for reliable, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure.
udacity.Prequisites: Experience with cloud computing, programming and Microsoft Azure.
udacity.What you learn: This program prepares students for a career as an Azure Solution Architect and trains them to translate business requirements into technical specifications for reliable, scalable and secure cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure.

udacity.Title: Cloud DevOps using Microsoft Azure
udacity.Short Intro: Learn to develop and deploy cloud-based applications on Microsoft Azure, the cloud services platform used by 95% of Fortune 500 companies.
udacity.Prequisites: Intermediate Python, familiarity with Linux shell scripting and cloud concepts.
udacity.What you learn: Microsoft Azure is one of the most popular cloud services platforms used by enterprises, making it a crucial tool for cloud computing professionals to add to their skillset. The Cloud DevOps using Microsoft Azure Nanodegree program teaches students how to deploy, test, and monitor cloud applications on Azure, thereby preparing learners for success on Microsoft’s AZ-400 DevOps Engineer Expert certification exam.

udacity.Title: Become a Machine Learning Engineer for Microsoft Azure
udacity.Short Intro: Strengthen your machine learning skills and build practical experience by training, validating, and evaluating models using Azure Machine Learning.
udacity.Courses: Machine Learning Engineer for Microsoft Azure
udacity.Prequisites: Prior experience with Python, Machine Learning, and Statistics
udacity.What you learn: In this program, students will enhance their skills by building and deploying sophisticated machine learning solutions using popular open source tools and frameworks, and gain practical experience running complex machine learning tasks using the built-in Azure labs accessible inside the Udacity classroom.

simplilearn.Title: AWS Data Analytics Certification Training Course
simplilearn.Short Intro: Simplilearnâ€™s AWS Data Analytics certification training prepares you for all aspects of hosting big data and performing distributed processing on the AWS platform. Our AWS data analytics course is aligned with the AWS Certified Data Analytics Specialty exam and helps you pass it in a single try. Developed by industry leaders, this AWS certified data analytics training explores some interesting topics like AWS QuickSight, AWS lambda and Glue, S3 and DynamoDB, Redshift, Hive on EMR, among others

simplilearn.Title: AWS SysOps Associate Certification Training
simplilearn.Short Intro: Get hands-on exposure to the highly scalable Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud platform with the AWS SysOps Associate certification training program. This course will help you attain valuable technical expertise in deploying, managing, and operating fault-tolerant systems on AWS.

simplilearn.Title: AWS Developer Associate Certification Training
simplilearn.Short Intro: Enhance your proficiency with the Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud platform to develop and deploy robust cloud applications with an AWS Developer Associate Certification. This course helps you implement cloud security best practices and understand what it takes to become an AWS Developer Associate.

simplilearn.Title: AWS Solutions Architect Certification Training Course
simplilearn.Short Intro: AWS certification training course is essential for every aspiring AWS-certified solutions architect. You will master AWS architectural principles and services such as IAM, VPC, EC2, EBS and elevate your career to the cloud, and beyond with this AWS course.

futurelearn.Short Intro: Expand your understanding of AWS Cloud concepts and services and gain the basic knowledge you need to pursue an AWS certification.
